Item.title: Add Biller
Item.desc: Select to Add a new Biller to your Account to pay Bills

Item.title: Bill History
Item.desc: Select to view Receipt of a previously paid Bill

Item.title: Change Draft Limit
Item.desc: Select to Change the Draft Issuing Limit on your Account

Item.title: Change Password
Item.desc: Select to Change your Profile and/or Transaction Password

Item.title: Control Manager
Item.desc: Select to Open the Control Manager

Item.title: Delete Biller
Item.desc: Select to delete an already configured Biller if of no use

Item.title: Draft Status
Item.desc: Select to check the Status of your Draft
